message.translation: - Check that the cable connections are correct. Refer to the router Installation Guide for instructions.
message.variable: - Check that the cable connections are correct. Refer to the router Installation Guide for instructions.

message.translation: - Check that your broadband modem is power cycled correctly. If you have a battery-backed modem, remove and reinsert the battery to power cycle your modem.
message.variable: - Check that your broadband modem is power cycled correctly. If you have a battery-backed modem, remove and reinsert the battery to power cycle your modem.

message.translation: 1. The modem was not power cycled during the cabling step.
message.variable: 1. The modem was not power cycled during the cabling step.

message.translation: 2. The yellow Ethernet cable is not fully inserted, or is inserted in the wrong place.

message.translation: After you have checked the Ethernet cable, click Try again.
message.variable: After you have checked the Ethernet cable, click Try again.

message.translation: To avoid a conflict with your Internet Service Provider, your router's IP address has been updated to
message.variable: To avoid a conflict with your Internet Service Provider, your router's IP address has been updated to

message.translation: To solve this problem, make sure that the yellow Ethernet cable is securely plugged in to the broadband modem port and the router Internet port.
message.variable: To solve this problem, make sure that the yellow Ethernet cable is securely plugged in to the broadband modem port and the router Internet port.

message.translation: To solve this problem, power cycle the modem (turn it off and on). To power cycle a modem with battery backup, you might need to remove and reinsert its battery. After the power cycle, wait 2 minutes for the modem to completely start up.
message.variable: To solve this problem, power cycle the modem (turn it off and on). To power cycle a modem with battery backup, you might need to remove and reinsert its battery. After the power cycle, wait 2 minutes for the modem to completely start up.

message.translation: Yes. My ISP assigned a fixed (static) IP address to me.
message.variable: Yes. My ISP assigned a fixed (static) IP address to me.

message.translation: You are not yet connected to the Internet.
message.variable: You are not yet connected to the Internet.

message.translation: You are successfully connected to the Internet.
message.variable: You are successfully connected to the Internet.

message.translation: Your router is preset with WPA2-PSK wireless security to protect your network from unwanted access. To join the wireless network, you must enter the network key (password). These preset settings are unique to this device, like a serial number. If you want to change them, you can do so later in the Wireless Settings screen on the router web GUI.
message.variable: Your router is preset with WPA2-PSK wireless security to protect your network from unwanted access. To join the wireless network, you must enter the network key (password). These preset settings are unique to this device, like a serial number. If you want to change them, you can do so later in the Wireless Settings screen on the router web GUI.

message.translation: Wireless security is not enabled on this router. NETGEAR highly recommends that you
message.variable: Wireless security is not enabled on this router. NETGEAR highly recommends that you

message.translation: to enable wireless security and protect your network.
message.variable: to enable wireless security and protect your network.

message.translation: Choose your city and ISP name:
message.variable: Choose your city and ISP name:

message.translation: If your ISP is not presented in the list, please proceed with
message.variable: If your ISP is not presented in the list, please proceed with

message.translation: Do you require to enter login and password for Internet access? Choose "Yes" , if you need to start connection to the Internet manually each type after turning on a PC . Otherwise choose "No".
message.variable: Do you require to enter login and password for Internet access? Choose "Yes" , if you need to start connection to the Internet manually each type after turning on a PC . Otherwise choose "No".

message.translation: You have chosen "Yes". That means you have a VPN connection, which could be PPTP, L2TP or PPPoE type depending on the ISP. If you do not know what VPN type your ISP is using, you may call your ISP support or check it on a PC directly connected to Internet by clicking "Details" in the Status page of your VPN connection.
message.variable: You have chosen "Yes". That means you have a VPN connection, which could be PPTP, L2TP or PPPoE type depending on the ISP. If you do not know what VPN type your ISP is using, you may call your ISP support or check it on a PC directly connected to Internet by clicking "Details" in the Status page of your VPN connection.

message.translation: You have chosen "No". That means you have Dynamic IP (DHCP) or Static IP connection mode. You need to choose, whether your settings are received dynamically or assigned manually.
message.variable: You have chosen "No". That means you have Dynamic IP (DHCP) or Static IP connection mode. You need to choose, whether your settings are received dynamically or assigned manually.

message.translation: Does your ISP provide you local resources? This might include local ftp server, trackers, DC++ hubs, IPTV, etc.
message.variable: Does your ISP provide you local resources? This might include local ftp server, trackers, DC++ hubs, IPTV, etc.

message.translation: Attention! You have Static IP settings for your intranet interface. That means you might need to add static routes for ISP local resources working correctly. Please proceed to the Static routes page in router's GUI after CA finishes the setup process.
message.variable: Attention! You have Static IP settings for your intranet interface. That means you might need to add static routes for ISP local resources working correctly. Please proceed to the Static routes page in router's GUI after CA finishes the setup process.

message.translation: You have finished manual configuration process. Please go through your settings once again to see whether you've made any mistakes:
message.variable: You have finished manual configuration process. Please go through your settings once again to see whether you've made any mistakes:

message.translation: Please click "Check connection" button to check your internet connection.
message.variable: Please click "Check connection" button to check your internet connection.

message.translation: Router has failed connecting to the internet. The cause might be in the wrong input settings or ISP downtime. Choose "Back" to check your settings and try again or "Start from the beginning" to go through the wizard again.
message.variable: Router has failed connecting to the internet. The cause might be in the wrong input settings or ISP downtime. Choose "Back" to check your settings and try again or "Start from the beginning" to go through the wizard again.

message.translation: Congratulations! You have successfully connected to the internet!
message.variable: Congratulations! You have successfully connected to the internet!

message.translation: Please enter static IP address and/or DNS servers for your internet interface if your ISP provided such information. In most cases you should skip this step keeping default values (Get dynamically from ISP).
message.variable: Please enter static IP address and/or DNS servers for your internet interface if your ISP provided such information. In most cases you should skip this step keeping default values (Get dynamically from ISP).

message.translation: Does your ISP provide local resources
message.variable: Does your ISP provide local resources

message.translation: Please enter the following settings(you may find it in the brouchure your ISP provided):
message.variable: Please enter the following settings(you may find it in the brouchure your ISP provided):

message.translation: Your ISP is using MAC address binding for security reasons. If you are configuring the router from a PC previously connected to the internet, please choose "Use Computer MAC Address". You may want to keep the router's MAC address or change it manually, but you will be required to ask your ISP to update their MAC address information.
message.variable: Your ISP is using MAC address binding for security reasons. If you are configuring the router from a PC previously connected to the internet, please choose "Use Computer MAC Address". You may want to keep the router's MAC address or change it manually, but you will be required to ask your ISP to update their MAC address information.

message.translation: Router has failed connecting to the internet. The cause might be in wrong input settings, ISP downtime, settings changes made by ISP (which are not correspond to the ones stored in router) or incorrectly chosen ISP connection type (if your ISP has different types of connection). Choose "Configuration manually" to reconfigure your router's internet connection manually. Choose \"Configure later\" to quit wizard.
message.variable: Router has failed connecting to the internet. The cause might be in wrong input settings, ISP downtime, settings changes made by ISP (which are not correspond to the ones stored in router) or incorrectly chosen ISP connection type (if your ISP has different types of connection). Choose "Configuration manually" to reconfigure your router's internet connection manually. Choose \"Configure later\" to quit wizard.

message.translation: Choose your city and ISP name:
message.variable: Choose your city and ISP name:

message.translation: Your ISP is using static IP address connection type. You need to enter the following information
message.variable: Your ISP is using static IP address connection type. You need to enter the following information

message.translation: Your ISP is using static IP address for local resource access. Please provide the following settings(DNS servers are optional and only filled when you received them from ISP):
message.variable: Your ISP is using static IP address for local resource access. Please provide the following settings(DNS servers are optional and only filled when you received them from ISP):

message.translation: Your ISP is using Static IP address for local resources access. Please enter intranet IP address and subnet mask. If you have a gateway specified, you can add it later during static routes configuration.
message.variable: Your ISP is using Static IP address for local resources access. Please enter intranet IP address and subnet mask. If you have a gateway specified, you can add it later during static routes configuration.

message.translation: Your ISP may provide Dynamic IP (DHCP) or Static IP connection mode for your intranet interface. You need to choose, whether your settings are received dynamically or assigned manually.
message.variable: Your ISP may provide Dynamic IP (DHCP) or Static IP connection mode for your intranet interface. You need to choose, whether your settings are received dynamically or assigned manually.

message.translation: Enter DNS servers manually only if your ISP provided you with such information.
message.variable: Enter DNS servers manually only if your ISP provided you with such information.

message.translation: Some ISPs using MAC address binding for security reasons. Please specify, whether router should use his own MAC address, your current PC's MAC address or manually add MAC address required.
message.variable: Some ISPs using MAC address binding for security reasons. Please specify, whether router should use his own MAC address, your current PC's MAC address or manually add MAC address required.

message.translation: Next, we will guide you through configuring the router to use your Mobile Broadband Internet connection.
message.variable: Next, we will guide you through configuring the router to use your Mobile Broadband Internet connection.

message.variable: Can Not Connect to The Internet

message.variable: The problem could be one of the following.

message.translation: Check the configuration settings you entered for your Modem.
message.variable: Check the configuration settings you entered for your Modem.

message.variable: Please verify that the modem has been activated and there is network coverage at your current location.

message.translation: There is a problem with the DNS servers in the Mobile Broadband network.
message.variable: There is a problem with the DNS servers in the Mobile Broadband network.

message.variable: Check with your mobile service provider to verify that the service at your location is working properly then run the Setup Wizard Again.

message.translation: Wireless AP mode allows this device to work as a stand-alone wireless access point on your existing network.
message.variable: Wireless AP mode allows this device to work as a stand-alone wireless access point on your existing network.

message.translation: Enable fixed IP settings on this device (not recommended)
message.variable: Enable fixed IP settings on this device (not recommended)

message.translation: Please follow these instructions to have the optimal setup and performance:
message.variable: Please follow these instructions to have the optimal setup and performance:

message.translation: Step1:Make sure this device's Internet port is connected with an cable to one of the LAN ports on the existing router.
message.variable: Step1:Make sure this device's Internet port is connected with an cable to one of the LAN ports on the existing router.

message.translation: Step2:If your existing router has wireless capability, turn it off or disable it, to avoid interference with this new AP device. Or at least run it at a defferent wireless channel.
message.variable: Step2:If your existing router has wireless capability, turn it off or disable it, to avoid interference with this new AP device. Or at least run it at a defferent wireless channel.

message.translation: Once you are done, click Apply to continue
message.variable: Once you are done, click Apply to continue

message.translation: Note:After you click Apply,this device will change to a new IP assigned by your existing router,therefore this web page might not be available. Please close and restart web browser to http://www.routerlogin.net/ again.
message.variable: Note:After you click Apply,this device will change to a new IP assigned by your existing router,therefore this web page might not be available. Please close and restart web browser to http://www.routerlogin.net/ again.

message.translation: This router is also capable of connecting to 3G/4G Mobile Network. If you have a supported 3G/4G mobile broadband adapter, you can use the Setup Mobile Broadband button below to run the wizard.
message.variable: This router is also capable of connecting to 3G/4G Mobile Network. If you have a supported 3G/4G mobile broadband adapter, you can use the Setup Mobile Broadband button below to run the wizard.

message.variable: Share your life, share your memory, sharing makes your life more memorable.

message.translation: NETGEAR Cloud provides a private and secure cloud sharing circle.
message.variable: NETGEAR Cloud provides a private and secure cloud sharing circle.

message.translation: You and your cared ones can share everything in your life.
message.variable: You and your cared ones can share everything in your life.

message.translation: Genie app. A personal dashboard that lets you monitor, control, and repair your home network.
message.variable: Genie app. A personal dashboard that lets you monitor, control, and repair your home network.

message.translation: ReadySHARE Vault app (Only for Windows computers). Enables automatic continuous backup of a Windows computer to a USB drive that’s connected to your router.
message.variable: ReadySHARE Vault app (Only for Windows computers). Enables automatic continuous backup of a Windows computer to a USB drive that’s connected to your router.

message.variable: Click the Next button after you install the Genie app to finish configuring the router.

message.variable: Upgrading Router Firmware now. Please Wait

minutes for firmware upgrade.
Please don't turn off the power or press reset button.

minutes for firmware upgrade.

message.translation: The Router is downloading the new version now. Please wait...
message.variable: The Router is downloading the new version now. Please wait...

message.variable: A new version has been found. Do You want to upgrade to the new version now?

message.translation: This process can take a minute or two; please wait...
message.variable: This process can take a minute or two; please wait...

message.translation: An existing router or gateway is detected in your network
message.variable: An existing router or gateway is detected in your network

message.translation: Your NETGEAR router is connected to a network that already has another router. If you want to leave the first router connected, genie recommends using Access Point mode for the NETGEAR router. When the NETGEAR router is in Access Point mode, you can use it to join the network and the other router continues to perform the same network tasks as before.
message.variable: Your NETGEAR router is connected to a network that already has another router. If you want to leave the first router connected, genie recommends using Access Point mode for the NETGEAR router. When the NETGEAR router is in Access Point mode, you can use it to join the network and the other router continues to perform the same network tasks as before.

message.translation: Do you want to setup this device in Access Point mode
message.variable: Do you want to setup this device in Access Point mode

message.translation: No, I would like to run it in default mode as a router
message.variable: No, I would like to run it in default mode as a router

message.translation: To add this router to your network in Access Point Mode
message.variable: To add this router to your network in Access Point Mode

message.translation: IP Address of this new device
message.variable: IP Address of this new device

message.translation: Get IP Address dynamically from existing router
message.variable: Get IP Address dynamically from existing router

message.translation: Note: After you click Next, this router will be assigned a new IP address. When it happens your browser might be disconnected from the network. To reconnect to the router, close the window and launch your browser again.
message.variable: Note: After you click Next, this router will be assigned a new IP address. When it happens your browser might be disconnected from the network. To reconnect to the router, close the window and launch your browser again.

message.translation: Your NETGEAR router is connected to a network that already has another router.This means that you must select an operation mode:
message.variable: Your NETGEAR router is connected to a network that already has another router.This means that you must select an operation mode:

message.translation: Router mode gives you two different networks:The existing network from the original router,and another network form your new NETGEAR router.If all of your devices connect to NETGEAR router,recommend to use Router Mode.
message.variable: Router mode gives you two different networks:The existing network from the original router,and another network form your new NETGEAR router.If all of your devices connect to NETGEAR router,recommend to use Router Mode.

message.translation: This mode keeps the existing network from the original router only.Not all of the NETGEAR router's features are available in Access Point mode.If you have devices connect to both existing router and NETGEAR router,recommend to use Access Point Mode.
message.variable: This mode keeps the existing network from the original router only.Not all of the NETGEAR router's features are available in Access Point mode.If you have devices connect to both existing router and NETGEAR router,recommend to use Access Point Mode.

message.translation: Your router is about to setup to Access Point Mode.You may experience short network interruption due to your router and client will need to obtain new IP address from your existing Router.If you lost network connection,you may manually connect to router again by visiting www.routerlogin.net.
message.variable: Your router is about to setup to Access Point Mode.You may experience short network interruption due to your router and client will need to obtain new IP address from your existing Router.If you lost network connection,you may manually connect to router again by visiting www.routerlogin.net.

message.translation: The following router features are not available if you choose Access Point mode:
message.variable: The following router features are not available if you choose Access Point mode:
